SEARCH

Class Book

java.lang.Object
Book
public class Book extends Object
Book class represents a created book object that contains mutator and getter methods allowing the book object to be modified and have its contents output to terminal or returned.
Since:
2024-03-10
Version:
1.0
Author:
Maksim Strelkov - no copyright

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(String authorFN, String authorRN, String title, Genre genre)
      Basic Book class constructor for books with a single author.
      Parameters:
      authorFN - Author's family name.
      authorRN - Rest of author's name.
      title - What the book is called.
      genre - What genre the book belongs in.

    • Book

      public Book(String authorFN, String authorRN, String title, Genre genre, int year, String publisher, int numPages)
      Book class constructor with more in-depth information for books with a single author.
      Parameters:
      authorFN - Author's family name.
      authorRN - Rest of author's name.
      title - What the book is called.
      genre - What genre the book belongs in.
      year - What year the book was released in.
      publisher - The group / person that released it.
      numPages - How many pages it contains.

    • Book

      public Book(String[] authors, String title, Genre genre, int year, String publisher, int numPages)
      Book class constructor for books with multiple authors, with in-depth detail about the book.
      Parameters:
      authors - Array containing strings of author's family name and rest of their name.
      title - What the book is called.
      genre - What genre the book belongs in.
      year - What year the book was released in.
      publisher - The group / person that released it.
      numPages - How many pages it contains.

    • getCitation

      public String getCitation()
      Outputs a citation depending on what genre the book is set in, including essential book information like the publisher, year and how many pages are inside.
      Returns:
      Formatted string of the books' information.
